ygData.subject: Out of the Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: (Someone planning on posting damage for the Cybertronian Fire?) The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Dark Wolf/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/

Subject: Out of the Fire
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Someone planning on posting damage for the Cybertronian Fire?)

The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Dark Wolf/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/ 
Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/  
Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/ Sun Crusher/Reflector/ 
Smokescreen/Serpentor/Sixshot/Ares:



Dark Wolf slashed with his hand, the missiles exploding against his right 
hand and tearing it open.  He let out a snarl of anger, and raised his blade 
missile, firing it off against the Cybertronian Fire.  The twenty-five foot 
gestalt then fired two optic blasts at Shivah.  Several explosive rounds tore 
into his arm and he let out a roar, firing a fire ball off at Blades.

---

Dark One heard the order to retreat and decided not to argue.  He got over 
Pyro and transformed into his fighter mode, Pyro sitting in the cockpit.  The 
Oblitercon leader blasted off into the air, heading towards the Iron Fist.

---

Breakdown cursed.  "Son of a..." he picked up Hiss and Scavenger, walking 
very slowly because of the weight and leaving deep impressions with his feet 
in the destroyed ground as he chased after Dark One.

---

First Aid managed to get to his feet, and began slow repairs on Hot Rod.

---

Blades avoided most of the fire ball, the entire left side of his apache mode 
burnt slightly.  "Damn Decepticons." he cursed as he gained altitude and 
armed his missiles.

He spotted someone firing on Smokescreen, and fired off two missiles at the 
robot responsible, Darkfate.

---

Groove and Streetwise will still being carried away by friendly Maximals to 
get much needed repairs.

---

Scattershot looked disgusted at Darkfate's soldiers, staring for a cycle 
blankly.  He then spun around real quick, transformed to bald eagle mode, and 
crazily flapped his wings, flying off after Zardus.

---

Imprisoner transformed to biped mode and blasted off through the air with his 
boosters at full power.  The explosions from below sent him flying upwards 
event faster as his boosters began to fizzle out.

Imprisoner headed straight down, firing three optic blasts off at Rixer.  He 
transformed in mid air, the quick decent causing him to easily avoid rapid 
laser fire shot at him.  He crashed to the ground in his tank mode, firing 
off a missile each from both of his cannons.  Two missiles streaked through 
the air towards the Element.

---

Predator's sensors detected laser fire, missiles, and an incoming robot.  He 
leapt back, flying upwards into the air.  He avoided the missiles, and the 
bot, but two blasts from Darkfate dug into his calf on the way up and tore it 
painfully wide open.  He raised his launcher, firing off a rocket at 
Reptillica and another at the Cybertronian Fire.

(Jen, since Forrior would've been point blank had Predator stayed there, the 
missiles shot by Firearm would be heading pretty much for Forrior now, since 
they had been fired at where Predator had last been, the location where 
Forrior would now be.  I believe, anyway)

---

Choran jumped out of the way of some autogun fire, and raised his weapon.  He 
fired off his rifle in an arc, five laser blasts at Rixer, 10 at Truttle, and 
ten at Demise.

---

Easily avoiding some shots, Shockwave looked to Wildrider.  "Megatron?  As in 
the Predacon impostor?  Be gone before you are melted down!" he intoned 
without emotion.  He raised his missile launcher, firing off two rockets.  
Both heading for the Element.

---

Firestarter avoided most of the shots, some digging into his frame.  He 
launched off two missiles at the Element from his missile launcher, and then 
transformed back into space fighter mode, engines roaring and sending him 
screaming through the air.

---

Unitron flew fast, only a few shots from Dollon and Drillbit digging into his 
frame.  He cursed, firing off four blasts from his rifle, two at Dollon and 
two at Drillbit.

---

Double Punch felt three tentacles wrap around him as a mass of voltage ripped 
through his body.

---

Beeline hovered, and fired twenty-five rapid laser blasts from its bulging 
eyes off at EndBringer.  It then powered up its engines and gained altitude 
so it wouldn't be easily shot.

---

Manterror avoided most of the shots, some digging further into his badly 
damaged body.  He fired off six ion disks, three from each arm.  Three at 
Manthys, three at Wespah.

---

Injector got struck by a charge, which knocked him out of the way of other 
shots.  Hovering painfully, he raised his arm, firing off four missiles 
total.  Two down at the Cybertronian Fire, two at the Element.

---

Vehement flew hard, avoiding most shots but a missile blew up against his 
left abs, ripping the armor plating there wide open.  He cursed, raising both 
arms and launching off two missiles and ten rapid optic blasts. A missile at 
Killfest, a missile at Reptilica, and the ten rapid optic blasts at Forrior.

---

Sun Crusher jumped into the air, avoiding the missile but several shots dug 
into his armored form.  He laughed as the missile headed near the stasis 
locked Smokescreen.

He raised his rifle, firing off three powerful blasts from the heavy laser 
rifle, two at Truttle and one at Rixer.  He then did some quick modifications 
and threw the rifle with great accuracy and strength like a javelin at the 
Element with the explosion power of a small grenade, not much, but better 
than nothing.

He raised his arms, firing off a missile at the Cybertronian Fire, which was 
almost out of range.

---

Reflector avoided the missiles heading for him, which cratered the surface of 
the already worn ground below him.  Several shots tore into his rather 
untouched leg armor.  "You pieces of slag heathens!" he yelled, raising his 
arms and firing off two missiles.  One at Blyer, the other at Wespah.

---

Smokescreen was hit by the missile, which sent him flying through the air, 
avoiding Darkfate's shots (thanks for small favors), his badly beaten form 
only ripped apart more as he slammed to the ground, shrapnel stuck in him all 
over.  The Maximal did not stir, still in stasis lock and it wasn't going to 
change, especially after that missile hit.

---

Serpentor was still being filled with energy by the CF's shields, and his 
systems overloaded, his body exploding like a bomb (the explosion would hit 
the CF, BTW), and the only thing the remained was Serpentor's charred head 
that went flying through the air, catching the attention of Scattershot who 
caught it like a football in his talons.  He did a victory dance in mid air, 
as best a bald eagle could do, and continued after Zardus.

---

Nemesis Enforcer remained offline, being carried by Zardus.

---

Ares avoided the missiles, a few plasma shots digging into his wings, almost 
penetrating them in some areas, not doing much in other.  

Still in near perfect condition, especially compared to the others, he 
launched off two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire, followed by ten rapid 
laser blasts.

---

Sixshot continued onward, his dorsal fins being blown clear off by a missile 
explosion and plasma blasts.

"You Autobot trash!" he yelled, firing off two missiles and twenty rapid 
laser blasts at the source of his pain, the Element.
